Document.Title: Definitions of Introductory, Intermediate And Advanced Skills

Content:
According to Applications Developers (www.appdev.com), these are the skill levels:

Introductory
>The IDE
> Controls
> Events
> Compiliation and Distribution
> VBA
> Forms
> Menus

Intermediate
> Objects
> DAO
> Multi-User Applications
> Class Module Techniques
> MDI Applications
> Windows API
> Printing
> Crystal Reports
> Optimization Techniques
> On-Line Help
> Writing to the Registry

Advanced
> Concepts of ActiveX
> Automation
> Distributed COM
> Building ActiveX Controls
> RDO
> Internet Related Functionality
